name: PLUMP SHOT LIP SERUM
description: A lip serum that instantly hydrates and naturally plumps the look of lips. This serum is formulated with a unique blend of hyaluronic acid and powerful peptides to help plump the look of lips and reduce the appearance of fine lines. The cooling ceramic applicator helps soothe lips and delivers the perfect amount of product for a smooth, even application.

name: LIP GLOSS
description: A high-shine lip gloss that delivers a beautiful sheen via a non-sticky formula. This gloss is formulated with a unique blend of oils for a super glossy finish, while the pillowy applicator delivers the perfect amount of product for comfortable wear.

name: LIPSTICK
description: A full-coverage lipstick that delivers bold, long-lasting color. This lipstick is formulated with a unique blend of oils for a super creamy texture and incredibly smooth application. The high-pigment color glides on easily and stays put for a long-lasting finish.

name: LIP LINER
description: A long-wearing lip liner that defines with a precise, creamy finish. This liner is formulated with a unique blend of oils for a super creamy texture and incredibly smooth application. The high-pigment color glides on easily and stays put for a long-lasting finish.
